```{r downloadData, include=FALSE}
fileUrl <- "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/dsscapstone/dataset/Coursera-SwiftKey.zip"

if(!file.exists("data")) {
    dir.create("data")
}

if(!file.exists("data/final/en_US")) {
    tempFile <- tempfile()
    download.file(fileUrl, tempFile)
    unzip(tempFile, exdir = "data")
}
```
